thread.title: Daughter watches as 100 balloons commemorate beloved waitress killed in I-94 crash
thread.title_full: Daughter watches as 100 balloons commemorate beloved waitress killed in I-94 crash

author: Danielle Salisbury | Danielle_Salisbury@mlive.com
title: Daughter watches as 100 balloons commemorate beloved waitress killed in I-94 crash
text: Cockroft and about 30 others gathered Wednesday night on the lawn in front of Denny's to remember 30-year-old Brittany Hammond, a waitress at the restaurant killed last week in a head-on, semitrailer-car crash on I-94.
